lead_paragraph: The cellist Yo-Yo Ma joined the pianist Emanuel Ax for the first of three recitals Mr. Ax is devoting to Schumann and Chopin.
snippet: The cellist Yo-Yo Ma joined the pianist Emanuel Ax for the first of three recitals Mr. Ax is devoting to Schumann and Chopin.
